title: 87 The Truth About Intelligence and the Many Paths To Greatness with Scott Barry Kaufman
description:
"I think educators have a misguided view of how we realize potential and what these tests are actually measuring." - Scott Barry Kaufman
Please come visit us, find the show resources and connect with the School of Greatness:
www.lewishowes.com/87
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
